text: Chaulieu may refer to == People == * Guillaume Amfrye de Chaulieu (1639–1720), French poet and wit * Pierre Chaulieu, pseudonym of Cornelius Castoriadis (1922–1997), a Greek-French philosopher, social critic, economist, psychoanalyst, and author == Place == * Chaulieu a commune in the Manche department in Normandy in north-western France * Saint-Christophe-de-Chaulieu == Other == * Louise de Chaulieu (1805–1835), character in Mémoires de deux jeunes mariées by Honoré de Balzac
title: Chaulieu (disambiguation)
